name: Real 3D Air Hockey
description:
Enjoy fast-paced action in this very close to reality Air Hockey Game. Score goals against device or your best friend in the multiplayer mode. Easy to play, tough to master, improve your skills to top the worlwide players ranking.

main features:

- Vey Accurate Controls, easy to pick up
- 3D and 2D Views
- Top Full 3D Graphics
- Real Physic Engine
- 3 AI Levels
- Multiplayer On Same Device
- 6 Tables, 4 Mallets
